title: Collaborative Geography Exploration with Sustainable Development Goals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geographic concepts and experience using digital maps
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in non-real-time online environments optimized for smartphone learning, linking local community issues to Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

learning_goals: Students collaboratively collect and analyze local spatial data, document it on wiki platforms, and explain its relevance to Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Students can participate in creating maps that reflect gender balance and women's contributions to society using digital mapping tools
Learners can demonstrate information-sharing and collaborative skills by editing SDGs-themed wiki pages

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
